title: My Account got hacked!!! Please HELP
body:
Hi guys,

Recently my account got banned until Jan next year, which is quite harsh as i did not do anything to have it banned, and i'm pretty sure it got hacked! How do i get my account back from Riot? What can i do? I am not quite sure how to go about this please help me out guys!!!!!!! May even shout RP to the person who can solve my dilemma!

Cheers and please help!!!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Do you have a copy-paste or screenshot of the time your account will be available? Riot doesn't give out 7 month bans so something really weird could be going on.

But as a number one priority you should get in touch with Riot Support [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Use the category _"I have a question about a suspension or restriction on my account"_ and fill out all your information. They should be able to sort everything else from there :D
send them a support ticket and talk to rito about it
